# This file is automatically generated from cmake.toml - DO NOT EDIT
# See https://github.com/build-cpp/cmkr for more information

# Create a configure-time dependency on cmake.toml to improve IDE support
if(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT)
	configure_file(cmake.toml cmake.toml COPYONLY)
endif()

# Target retdec-utils
set(CMKR_TARGET retdec-utils)
set(retdec-utils_SOURCES "")

list(APPEND retdec-utils_SOURCES
	alignment.cpp
	binary_path.cpp
	byte_value_storage.cpp
	conversion.cpp
	crc32.cpp
	dynamic_buffer.cpp
	file_io.cpp
	"io/log.cpp"
	"io/logger.cpp"
	math.cpp
	memory.cpp
	ord_lookup.cpp
	string.cpp
	system.cpp
	time.cpp
	version.cpp
	doxygen.h
	"io/log.cpp"
	"io/logger.cpp"
	"whereami/whereami.c"
)

list(APPEND retdec-utils_SOURCES
	cmake.toml
)

set(CMKR_SOURCES ${retdec-utils_SOURCES})
add_library(retdec-utils STATIC)

if(retdec-utils_SOURCES)
	target_sources(retdec-utils PRIVATE ${retdec-utils_SOURCES})
endif()

source_group(TREE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} FILES ${retdec-utils_SOURCES})

target_compile_features(retdec-utils PUBLIC
	cxx_std_20
)

target_include_directories(retdec-utils PUBLIC
	"../include"
	"../include/retdec"
	"../include/whereami"
)

unset(CMKR_TARGET)
unset(CMKR_SOURCES)
